headline: Is Halliburton Co. (NYSE:HAL) a Small-Cap Energy Stock Hedge Funds Are Buying?
summary: We recently published a list of the 15 Small-Cap Energy Stocks Hedge Funds Are Buying. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Halliburton Co. (NYSE:HAL) stands against other small-cap energy stocks. On April 12, Bill Perkins, Skylar Capital Management CEO, appeared on ‘Closing Bell Overtime’ on CNBC to talk about […]
